prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a colossal bio-android warrior, green chitinous exoskeleton with black spots, regal head horns, giant black insectoid eyes, black biomechanical wings
feature_prompt: bio-android, green beetle-like exoskeleton, black spots, high detailed skin, 8k uhd, cinematic lighting, dslr, soft bokeh, extreme texture detail on chitin, wet biological sheen, volumetric rim lighting
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic texture, human face, fleshy skin, toy, doll, flat lighting, blurry wings, yellow skin
